page.title: 16Religions- Sparkhill B'ham
page.content: In the area of Sparkhill there is one Sikh Temple which is called a gurdwara. There is an English Martyrs church which is a part of English Martyrs School, a Roman Catholic school. The gurdwara is quite small,and is painted orange on the outside. The gurdwara was a Day Nursery and a church before becoming a Sikh church. Sikh men wear turbans on their heads to cover their hair which is kept long as part of Sikh custom. There are also many Muslims and Hindi people in Sparkhill. My school is a Church of England School called St.John's.
